name: V_EHI_CRD_FILTER
description: View used for filtering claim reconciliation record for EHI exports.

columns.name: CLAIM_RECON_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: RQG_ID
columns.description: The requisition grouper ID from the claim associated with the claim reconciliation record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient ID from the claim associated with the claim reconciliation record.
